name: Extra Stuff
uniques: No defensive terrain bonus <for [{Military} {Land}] units> <in [Romania] tiles> <for [non-[Romania]] Civilizations>
When defeating a [{T-55} {non-[Captured Tank]} {non-[Rescued Tank]}] unit, earn [50] Gold and recruit it <with [75]% chance> <for [{Major} {non-[Angola]}] Civilizations>
When defeating a [{T-55} {Captured Tank}] unit, earn [100] Gold and recruit it <for [Angola] Civilizations>
Triggers a [T-55 Capture] event <upon gaining a [T-55] unit> <for [non-[Angola]] Civilizations> <when number of [Remaining [Angola] Civilizations] is more than [0]>
Triggers a [T-55 Rescue] event <upon gaining a [T-55] unit> <for [Angola] Civilizations>
[+12]% Strength <for [{Land} {Military}] units> <in [Open terrain] tiles> <in tiles adjacent to [{Rough terrain} {non-[Mountain]}] tiles> <when defending> <for [Lusitanian] Civilizations>
